title: Playoff Hunt; Buccaneers injuries; Cam Jordan; Christian Wilkins; Scott Pioli
itunes:title: Playoff Hunt; Buccaneers injuries; Cam Jordan; Christian Wilkins; Scott Pioli
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt and Super Bowl Champions Shaun O'Hara and Aqib Talib examine the list of teams in the playoff hunt and they share which team they like down the stretch in the regular season; then they're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares his take on Harbaugh's decision to go for two against the Green Bay Packers and his concerns for the injured Tampa Bay Buccaneers; also, defensive end for the Miami Dolphins, Christian Wilkins joined the show to discuss his touchdown on Sunday, his crazy celebrations, and the Dolphins six game winning streak; and lastly, they're joined by defensive end for the New Orleans Saints, Cam Jordan, and he shares his thoughts on shutting out the Buccaneers and getting his 100th sack on Tom Brady.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
